entry.title: Kings of a Purple Sea
entry.summary:
Author: Kca1516

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,854Chapters: 14/17Kudos: 324

Summary: Stiles and Derek are rival pirate captains, each trying to get one up on the other in an attempt to rule the seven seas.Derek is leader to the legendary Hale Pack. A ruthless family of werewolves who even the greatest fear.Stiles, The Sea Charmer, has his own cruel reputation - though no one has seen his true face as he hides in silks of dark blue wrappings.When a joint enemy threatens to take both crews out, will Stiles and Derek be able to put aside their differences and work together - or are they forever destined to burn in the water?

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,291Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 53

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn‚Äôt.No explanations, no goodbyes‚Äîjust the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn‚Äôt understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don‚Äôt need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,012Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 208

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega‚Ä¶ Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: Subject 42
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 626Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Derek Hale is missing, and his pack is starting to worry. He wouldn‚Äôt just leave without telling them. Something is wrong.Meanwhile, Stiles Stilinski has been trapped by the Dread Doctors for two years. He doesn‚Äôt know who Derek is, and Derek doesn‚Äôt know him. But their lives are about to cross in a way neither of them expected.The pack is searching for their alpha. Stiles is just trying to survive. And if the Dread Doctors have their way, neither of them will ever be the same again.
